translation.en: Would you like to see before, you know...
Yeah.
Brian? Who's this?
You know, I asked myself the same thing when my dad passed.
translation.es: Me pregunté lo mismo cuando murió mi papá:

translation.en: I said, "Who is this man?"
No, no, Brian. Who's this in the coffin?
-Because that's not my father. -Are you sure?
Are you asking me if I'm sure I know what my father looks like?
translation.es: ¿Crees que no puedo reconocer a mi papá?

translation.en: No, people make mistakes in a time of grief, Aaron.
Look at the damn body, man.
Oh, shit.
-You got Jackie Chan in there! -Okay, listen...
Come on, Brian. You know what my father looks like.
translation.es: Tú sabes cómo es mi papá.

translation.en: We are very scattered today.
This type of thing almost never happens.
-Almost never happens? -I said that out loud?
translation.es: -¿”Casi nunca pasa”? -¿Lo dije en voz alta?

translation.en: It's not Burger King. You can't just mess up my order.
translation.es: ¡No te equivocaste en una orden de comida!

translation.en: Please, just calm down. I think I know where he is.
translation.es: Cálmate. Creo que sé dónde está.

translation.en: You think?
If my dad's not in this coffin in one hour, then you have to take his place.
translation.es: Si no traes a mi papá en una hora, tú vas a ocupar su lugar.

translation.en: -You got it? -Don't worry. I'll get him back.
translation.es: No te preocupes, lo voy a traer.

translation.en: I promise that. He's in one of two places. I think it's the second place.
translation.es: Te lo prometo. Está en uno de dos lugares, creo que en el segundo.

translation.en: Listen, okay, guys? Let's pack this up. Close this.
Let's go, let's get out of here.
Wait a minute, before we move... Okay. Did I give you my keys?
translation.es: Un momento, antes de movernos. ¿Te di mis llaves?

translation.en: No. They in the car. I left the damn keys in the car.
translation.es: Están en el auto. Dejé las llaves en el auto.

translation.en: Let's go, guys. I think it's on.
If you're so antsy about being here, why'd you come out in the first place?
translation.es: Si estás tan nervioso, ¿por qué viniste?

translation.en: -You know why. -I hate funerals.
All about death, death, death.
I don't think funerals are designed for anybody to like, Norman.
translation.es: Los funerales no se hacen para gustarle a la gente.

translation.en: I suppose.
I don't want a regular funeral when it's my time to go, you know.
translation.es: Yo no quiero que me hagan un funeral normal.

translation.en: I want my life celebrated.
translation.es: Yo quiero que celebren mi vida.

translation.en: Like Anna Nicole Smith, Richard Nixon, somebody big and powerful.
translation.es: Como Anna Nicole Smith, Richard Nixon, alguien importante.

translation.en: I want mine to be the saddest day ever.
translation.es: Yo quiero que el mío sea tristísimo.

translation.en: Stock market should crash, factories shut down,
translation.es: Que la bolsa se desplome, cierren fábricas...

translation.en: girls crying in the streets.
That kind of thing. An eclipse would be nice.
translation.es: Ese tipo de cosas. Un eclipse estaría bien.

translation.en: -Come on. -What?
You still smoking after all of those warnings and stuff out there?
translation.es: ¿Sigues fumando a pesar de las advertencias?

translation.en: No, Norman, stop, all right. You used to smoke.
We used to smoke together.
I used to piss my pants and then I stopped.
translation.es: Antes me hacía pipí y dejé de hacerlo.

translation.en: I got my own problems to worry about without worrying about your damn smoking.
translation.es: Tengo mis propios problemas sin preocuparme de que fumes.

translation.en: Come on, Norman. What problems you got, man?
-I told you! My rash! -Got to use condoms, papa.
-On my hand, dude. -You still have to use a condom, Norman.
That's the first line of defense.
translation.es: Es la primera línea de defensa.

translation.en: This shit ain't normal. Look at it.
-Fuck. That ain't a rash, man. -What you think it is?
translation.es: -Carajo. Eso no es una erupción. -¿Qué crees que sea?

translation.en: I don't know, but it's very splotchy.
Splotchy? I hate splotchy. I'm gonna pass away, I'm gonna die!
-Nah. -And I'm so damn young!
They brought the wrong body.
Honey, did you hear me? They brought the wrong body.
translation.es: ¿Me oíste? Trajeron el cadáver de otro.

translation.en: Oh, my God! Well, do they know where he is?
They think so.
I told you. I told you not to use the Marshalls,
translation.es: Te lo dije: “No uses a los Marshall”...

translation.en: but, no, you wanted to keep it all in the neighborhood.
Don't rub it in, not today. I got too much to worry about.
translation.es: No me lo reclames hoy. Me preocupan muchas cosas.

translation.en: Dad insisted on having his funeral at home, so now I just can't escape it.
translation.es: Papá insistió en que su funeral fuera en la casa.

translation.en: Death is everywhere.
translation.es: La muerte está en todas partes.

translation.en: Baby, no. No, it's not.
translation.es: Mi vida, no. No es cierto.

translation.en: Mom won't stop crying.
-Ryan hasn't helped out. -Not like he ever does.
Plus on top of that, I got to worry about this whole eulogy thing.
translation.es: Además tengo que preocuparme del elogio.

translation.en: I am sure it'll be the best eulogy anybody's ever heard.
translation.es: Seguro será el mejor elogio que hayan oído.

translation.en: All anybody's gonna be thinking is, "Why isn't Ryan doing the eulogy?
translation.es: Todos van a pensar: “¿Por qué no hace Ryan el elogio?”

translation.en: "Step aside and let the writer say a few words."
Even I'm gonna be thinking it.
translation.es: Hasta yo lo voy a pensar.

translation.en: Why don't you just let him do it then?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no dejas que la haga él?

translation.en: So, now you want Ryan to do the eulogy?
No. I'm just saying...
You're just saying that you wanna hear Ryan's eulogy.
translation.es: Que quieres oír el elogio de Ryan.

translation.en: No. You're the oldest, so...
So, the only reason I should do it is because I'm old.
translation.es: Sólo debo decirlo porque soy viejo.

translation.en: Aaron, calm down.
I think that you are every bit as good a writer as your brother.
translation.es: Tú eres tan buen escritor como tu hermano.

translation.en: I just think that you need to let someone actually read your book.
translation.es: Pero necesitas dejar que alguien lea tu libro.

translation.en: It's not ready yet.
Okay, fine. But don't forget, we close on the house next week.
translation.es: Bueno. Pero la semana entrante cerramos el trato de la casa.

translation.en: -I know. -I mean, I love your mom,
but I am so ready to move.
I know, honey, but we just got to get through today, okay?
translation.es: Ya sé, pero tenemos que acabar lo de hoy.

translation.en: Exactly.
I know this is rough.
translation.es: Yo sé que esto es duro.

translation.en: But it's the last day of my cycle.
translation.es: Pero es el último día de mi ciclo.

translation.en: And I'm 37 years old, so we need to try to,
you know, we need to do it, at least once today, okay?
translation.es: Necesitamos hacerlo al menos una vez hoy.

translation.en: -Babe. -Yeah?
You're gonna have to switch that cycle down to low for now, just for now.
translation.es: Deja lo del ciclo por ahora. Sólo por ahora.

translation.en: Can we at least find the body first?
-Are you okay? -Yeah, absolutely.
Okay, I'm a... I'm a little nervous.
Why, because you're gonna see my dad again?
translation.es: ¿Porque vas a ver a mi papá de nuevo?

translation.en: I just don't think I've ever been so openly hated by anyone before.
translation.es: Nadie me había odiado tan abiertamente.

translation.en: Even my seventh graders aren't that mean.
translation.es: Ni mis alumnos de 7o. son tan malos.

translation.en: I think he's gonna be more concerned today that his brother just died than be...
translation.es: Va a estar preocupado con la muerte de su hermano.

translation.en: -Babe. -I'm sorry, baby. It's the traffic.
Right. Anyway, when I tell him that we're getting married,
translation.es: Cuando le diga que nos vamos a casar...

translation.en: he's just gonna have to accept you. I...
-Jesus! Are you okay? -Oh, my God.
-You asshole! -Fuck you, bitch.
Oh, yeah, flip me off. Can't you see there's a traffic jam?
You poke your eye out, your father's gonna kill me.
translation.es: Si te sacas un ojo, tu papá me mata.

translation.en: -Oscar, baby. -Yes.
-Relax. Okay? -All right.
Everything is fine. Okay? Breathe.
Okay.
-Better? -Better.
Oh, good. It's okay.
Fuck you!
I think you'll find that everything is in perfect order.
translation.es: Verán que todo está en orden.

translation.en: Oh, so, now you wanna be professional.
You got your keys? You got your BlackBerry?
Because once we bury him, we not gonna dig him back up
just so you can tweet.
Look, I'm trying, okay?
Hey, how is your mother holding up, Aaron?
She's fine. She's in great health.
-There's no more business here. -Good.
What about your Uncle Russell? He wasn't doing that well.
translation.es: ¿Y tu tío Russell? Él no estaba bien.

translation.en: -How's he doing? -Bye.
Okay, I'm just asking. It's conversation, that's all.
I'm here if you need me, you know that. Thank you for everything.
translation.es: Estoy aquí para lo que necesiten. Gracias por todo.

translation.en: -Michelle, come here. -Bye, Brian.
You don't have to come.
I'm just saying, everybody knows that the Colonel stole that recipe
translation.es: Yo sólo digo que todos saben que el Coronel le robó la receta...

translation.en: for fried chicken from a slave named Jubalai.
Now, I give him credit for the coleslaw, but that's it.
translation.es: La ensalada de col sí es de él, pero nada más.

translation.en: Hey, buddy! How you doing?
I need a favor. I need you to pick up Uncle Russell.
translation.es: Necesito un favor, que recojas al tío Russell.

translation.en: Yeah, I know it's a hassle, but you're the closest.
translation.es: Ya sé que es una molestia, pero estás cerca.

translation.en: -Damn! He's always in a bad mood. -Just say you'll do it. We'll do it.
translation.es: -¡Maldita sea! ¡Siempre está de mal humor! -Di que lo recogerás.

translation.en: It's not a mood if he's always in it. It's his personality. Can you do it?
translation.es: Siempre está así. Es su personalidad. ¿Puedes ir?

translation.en: All right, I'll do it.
Hey, Mama. How you holding up?
There were so many things we wanted to do still.
translation.es: Había tantas cosas que todavía queríamos hacer.

translation.en: Travel. We were going to Australia and China.
translation.es: Viajar. Íbamos a ir a Australia y China.

translation.en: He wanted to go to Thailand.
Oh, come on, Ma, you're not gonna fly 25 hours.
That's not the point. I haven't been feeling well.
translation.es: Esa no es la cuestión. No me siento bien.

translation.en: Who knows how long I'm gonna live without him?
translation.es: ¡Quién sabe cuánto vaya a vivir sin él!

translation.en: It might make a difference if I had a grandchild
translation.es: Sería diferente si tuviera un nieto...

translation.en: who could take my mind off of everything, but...
translation.es: ...que me distrajera de todo esto, pero...

translation.en: -Oh, well. -Cynthia, we are trying.
I know what you're trying to do, Michelle, all hours of the day and night, trying.
translation.es: Yo sé lo que estás tratando de hacer a todas horas del día y de la noche.

translation.en: But it doesn't seem to be working, now does it?
Where's Ryan? -Have you talked to him yet? -He should be here soon.
translation.es: -¿Dónde está Ryan? ¿Ya hablaste con él? -Va a llegar pronto.

translation.en: Just to see his face would make me feel so much better.
translation.es: Con sólo verle la cara me voy a sentir mejor.

translation.en: Oh, I have missed him so much. My baby.
translation.es: Lo he extrañado muchísimo. Mi bebé.

translation.en: Do you need me to do something, Cynthia?
You could take your hand off my husband's coffin.
translation.es: Puedes quitar la mano del ataúd de mi esposo.

translation.en: You are leaving a smudge mark.
Is she shooting us the finger? Or is she just waving?
That's nice, ladies! Thank you!
-There he is. -What?
-He's okay. -He's gonna need assistance?
He's just grumpy.
You got to know how to handle him.
Oh, he looks kind of sweet.
-Hi, Uncle Russell! -Hi, Uncle Russell!
You remember me? I'm Norman.
I came to pick you up and take you to the funeral.
Where the fuck you been, you fat bastard? You took any longer, I'd be dead, too!
translation.es: ¿Dónde estabas, gordo? ¡Por poco me muero de viejo!

translation.en: Shit, good thing you know how to handle him.
Would you like to ride shotgun?
Stop the game, all right?
...take this missile in your ass.
translation.es: Métete este misil por el culo.

translation.en: -Listen. -Yes, the pills. I have them.
-They're right here. -All right, cool. Can I come and get them?
-I have a funeral to go to. Shit! -Whatever. Man, I'll come over there.
translation.es: -Tengo que ir a un funeral. ¡Mierda! -Puedo ir por ellas.

translation.en: -Fuck. -Did you try them?
No, no, I'm not gonna try them. I made them.
translation.es: No las voy a probar. Yo las hice.

translation.en: But they're good, right? The stuff's good?
I got to go. Never get high on your own supply.
translation.es: Me voy. Nunca te drogues con tu inventario.

translation.en: And, dude, this shit's gonna blow your mind, I guarantee it.
translation.es: Quedarás fuera de órbita, te lo garantizo.

translation.en: You'll love it. All right, got to go. Bye.
Do you always open the door half naked?
Come on, Jeff, we're gonna be late.
All I got to do is just put some pants on.
And this is my house, so... You all right, man?
translation.es: Y esta es mi casa. ¿Estás bien, amigo?

translation.en: -He's fine. He's just freaking out. -Is he okay?
-A car almost ran into us, and I was yelling. -And this guy just jumped right in our lane.
translation.es: -Casi chocamos y yo estaba gritando. -Un tipo se metió a nuestro carril.

translation.en: -I didn't see him. -He did, he totally did.
-I'm sorry, baby, I... -No, baby, it's fine. It's fine, okay?
You guys are funny. Hey, what do you think?
-Yes, no? -No.
-Go put on your pants, please. -All right.
And make sure they're black, Jeffrey!
Okay, Mom.
-I'm so hungry. -God, my heart is racing.
I don't know what's wrong with me.
Oh, here. Take this one. It'll calm you down. Jeff won't mind.
translation.es: Mira. Tómate esto. Te va a calmar. No le va a importar.

translation.en: What do you mean, take one of those? What is that?
It's Valium. I used to take it all the time. It's gonna make you feel better, I promise.
translation.es: Es Valium. Yo lo tomaba mucho. Te vas a sentir mejor.

translation.en: -Valium, are you sure? -Yeah.
-Yes. -You know, I shouldn't be taking someone else's pills, right?
translation.es: No debería tomas las pastillas de otro.

translation.en: -No, it's okay. -I got to drive and...
Babe, I'll drive. All right? Just open wide. There we go. Take...
translation.es: Yo manejo. ¿Está bien? Abre la boca. Eso es.

translation.en: Let's do this.
-Oh, my keys. -Jeff, you're wearing sneakers?
-They're black, Elaine. -But they're sneakers, Jeff.
Is he gonna be any less dead if I'm not wearing sneakers?
-Forget it. Let's just go. Can I just... -No, I got it.
-Come on, Jeff. -I'm coming. I'm coming.
-We're waiting. -Oh, shoot!
I still can't believe he's gone.
translation.es: No puedo creer que ya no esté.

translation.en: You can't understand death until you've given life.
translation.es: Para entender a la muerte hay que dar vida.

translation.en: -Hey, Mama. -Ryan, my baby!
Mama, I know this is hard, but it's gonna be okay,
translation.es: Yo sé que esto es difícil, pero todo va a salir bien.

translation.en: and we're gonna get through it.
Oh, Ryan, you always know exactly what to say, always!
I guess if people died every week, we'd see you all the time.
translation.es: Si hubiera más muertes, te veríamos mucho.

translation.en: -Hey, big bro. How you doing? -Holding up.
-How was your flight, Ryan? -It was okay.
But I had to buy the seat next to me. I just can't do the small talk anymore.
translation.es: ...pero tuve que comprar el asiento de al lado. Ya no aguanto estar charlando.

translation.en: And while I'm sitting there, up in first class, they march all the broke people through.
translation.es: Y mientras estoy ahí sentado, en primera clase, pasa toda la gente quebrada.

translation.en: And a couple of them eyeballing me, mad because I'm snacking on warm nuts.
translation.es: Unos me miran enojados porque me dieron nueces calientes.

translation.en: So I'm like, "Take your broke, no-nuts ass to the back of the plane."
translation.es: Yo pensaba: “Llévense sus traseros pobres a la zona de atrás”.

translation.en: Plus, there was tons of turbulence,
but I guess that's the thing about flying first class.
translation.es: Esa es la verdad sobre ir en primera.

translation.en: No matter how much you pay, if the plane crashes, you still end up dead.
translation.es: Por mucho que pagues, si el avión se estrella, tú también acabas muerto.

translation.en: -End up dead! -I'll make sure she's okay.
-Please. -End up dead!
You always know just what to say.
My bad.
Hey. I love it when you come to family functions, man.
translation.es: Me encanta que vengas a reuniones familiares.

translation.en: Because Dad takes his pure hate out on you.
translation.es: Papá descarga su odio sobre ti.

translation.en: -Jeff. -I'm joking. Oscar.
You okay?
Was there a dog in here just now?
-What? -What?
Like a Dalmatian or a Schnauzer?
-Honey, what are you talking about? -I don't know.
It's just a shame that somebody has to die to get the family together.
translation.es: Lástima que alguien tenga que morir para reunirnos.

translation.en: It was hard to see Dad like this. He's in a better place now, right?
translation.es: Fue duro ver a papá así. Está en un lugar mejor, ¿no?

translation.en: -He was sick a long time. -Since when does dead beat sick?
translation.es: -Estuvo enfermo mucho tiempo. -¿Es mejor estar muerto que enfermo?

translation.en: You know what I mean. This is why I try not to get close to people.
translation.es: Tú me entiendes. Trato de no encariñarme con nadie.

translation.en: -Too much emotion involved. -Guess that's why you never call.
Some families see each other all the time, some meet up at funerals.
translation.es: Unas familias se ven mucho, otras, en funerales.

translation.en: That's just us.
Hey, listen, I know this is a bad time, but I'm gonna need that money.
translation.es: Yo sé que es un mal momento, pero necesito ese dinero.

translation.en: -Shit. -We're splitting these costs, right?
Okay. But I don't have it right now.
translation.es: Sí, pero no lo tengo ahora.

translation.en: What the fuck you mean, you don't have it right now?
You just bought a first class ticket for your toothbrush.
translation.es: ¡Tu cepillo de dientes voló en primera!

translation.en: I don't have any cash. Honest.
I lost a lot of shit when the market collapsed.
translation.es: Perdí mucho dinero en la bolsa.

translation.en: So, if you don't mind, we gonna have to discuss this later.
-No, no, no, no, let's discuss this right now. -Hey, you mind?
I'm grieving.
Look at all these cars.
You got to get to these funerals early.
translation.es: Hay que llegar temprano a los funerales.

translation.en: Come on. There's nowhere to park.
-What? There's a spot right there. Grab it. -That looks like it's too close to the corner.
translation.es: -Ahí hay un lugar. -¡Está muy cerca de la esquina!

translation.en: -Nah. You can wedge it in there. Grab it. -I don't need a ticket today.
translation.es: -Sí cabes. Agárralo. -No necesito una multa hoy.

translation.en: You're gonna lose it. Grab it.
translation.es: Vas a perder ese lugar. Agárralo.

translation.en: Norman! Come on. Now, see?
Elaine! I was gonna park there.
Oh, I'm sorry, Norman. Are you family?
-No, but I'm like family. -Oh, honey, there's no such thing.
-Elaine. -Oh, God.
-Hey. -What are you doing here?
Well, your father invited me.
Thought you might need a real shoulder to cry on.
translation.es: Quiere un hombre que te consuele.

translation.en: -Oh, please. Come on. Oscar. -Who the fuck's that?
He... Come on, honey. We're here.
-You all right? -Come on.
We there?
-Yeah. -Damn. I got Uncle Russell.
How could I forget about Uncle Russell?
I said what's happening? What the hell is going on?
What the fuck's this guy doing?
It's very green here, isn't it? It's, like, so green.
translation.es: Está muy verde aquí. Está tremendamente verde.

translation.en: Like, God, wow, it's like... It's like I'm inside a lime.
translation.es: Siento que estoy dentro de una lima.

translation.en: -Oscar? -Yes?
-Look at me. -Okay.
Hi. Are you all right?
Yeah, why?
All this stuff about dogs and things being green.
translation.es: Todo esto de los perros y de las cosas verdes.

translation.en: What's going on?
What are you talking about? I'm fine. I've never been greener.
translation.es: ¿De qué hablas? Estoy bien. Jamás he estado más verde.

translation.en: Jeff, look at this.
-Hello. -What's wrong with Oscar?
-I don't know. -You guys keep playing.
Oh, my God. It's the Valium.
-Valium? -I'm in the band.
I gave him one of your Valium.
translation.es: Le di uno de tus Valiums.

translation.en: He's probably not used to it.
-Yeah, right. -I know you were looking.
translation.es: -Sí, claro. -Yo sé que me estabas mirando.

translation.en: Where's he going?
-Oscar! -Shit.
-You're going the wrong way, dumbass! -That hurts!
-Stop the car, Norman. -What?
Stop the car! I'm getting out. I got to talk to her.
I got to speak to Elaine. Stop the car.
translation.es: Tengo que hablar con Elaine. Para el auto.

translation.en: What about Uncle Russell?
-I need you to help... -Where are we?
-We're gonna be late, fatty! -Damn it!
Uncle Russell, you hit me in my splotch.
You got to stop this, Uncle Russell, or you gonna be in a box next.
translation.es: Deténgase o va a acabar en una caja.

translation.en: -Hey, how you doing? All right. -Thank you.
Who are these people? I don't recognize half of them.
translation.es: ¿Quién es esta gente? No reconozco a casi nadie.

translation.en: It's your family. You don't recognize them from the last funeral?
translation.es: Es tu familia. ¿No la reconoces del último funeral?

translation.en: What side of the family is he on?
Probably a friend of Dad's from work.
translation.es: Quizá sea un amigo del trabajo de papá.

translation.en: You know, the funeral looks good. You did a good job.
translation.es: El funeral se ve muy bien. Hiciste un buen trabajo.

translation.en: No, we did a good job.
Are you telling me I got to pay for the whole funeral?
I'm saying you gonna have to pay for the whole thing now.
translation.es: Necesitas pagar todos los gastos ahora.

translation.en: All right, just for a few months, till I get my next advance.
translation.es: Sólo unos meses, hasta mi siguiente adelanto.

translation.en: What am I, a damn credit union?
Goddamn, man! What the fuck? Jesus Christ!
Hello, boys. How you holding up?
We're doing pretty good.
We just got to wait for a few more people to come and then we can start.
translation.es: Cuando lleguen unas personas más podemos empezar.

translation.en: Have you met my brother, Ryan?
The writer? Oh, man!
You know, I got to tell you,
I squeezed this job in today because I really wanted to meet you.
translation.es: ...acepté este trabajo hoy porque tenía muchas ganas de conocerte.

translation.en: Listen, I just finished reading Momma's Secret.
translation.es: Acabo de terminar El secreto de mamá.

translation.en: But, listen, that'll be our little secret,
because I'm not supposed to be reading that kind of stuff, you know?
translation.es: ...porque yo no debo leer esa clase de libros.

translation.en: Right. Well, I'm sure the Lord'll forgive you.
-I can't wait to hear your eulogy. -Actually, I'm doing the eulogy.
translation.es: -Me muero por oír tu elogio. -Yo lo voy a hacer.

translation.en: -Oh, I thought... -Well, Aaron's the oldest, technically.
Really?
-How's my little Cynthia? -Oh, Duncan.
I'm just trying to hold it all together.
translation.es: Estoy tratando de mantener la compostura.

translation.en: He was a good husband and a great father to two healthy, strong boys.
translation.es: Fue un buen marido y un papá excelente de dos hijos sanos y fuertes.

translation.en: Why they have decided not to have children of their own
-is beyond me. -Cynthia.
Can I get you some coffee?
Coffee may do many things, Michelle, but it does not bring back the dead.
translation.es: El café podrá hacer muchas cosas, pero no resucita a nadie.

translation.en: Tea?
I got to go over the speech. Could you look out for Uncle Russell?
translation.es: Necesito repasar el elogio. ¿Cuidas al tío Russell?

translation.en: Look at Martina. Man, that girl is all grown up.
translation.es: La pequeña Martina. Cómo ha crecido.

-Elaine? I can't find the pill bottle. -Can you just...
translation.es: No encuentro la botella de pastillas.

translation.en: -Oscar, open the door. -Lasts up to eight hours.
-Open the door. -Perfect.
-Oscar, open the door, sweetie. -It's already been five minutes.
-That's good. -Damn it!
Motherfucker! Five minutes? Oh, shit!
-Shit, shit, shit, shit! -What's going on?
-Oscar, open the door, please. -You know what,
why don't you go get something to eat? We're gonna start pretty soon. Yeah.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no come algo? Vamos a empezar muy pronto.

translation.en: Grief does strange things to people, doesn't it?
translation.es: La aflicción le hace cosas raras a la gente, ¿no?

translation.en: -Yeah. -If you remember,
there's something I would like to talk to you about.
-Could we just do this... -Is there someplace private we could go?
translation.es: -¿Lo podemos hacer en otra...? -¿Podemos ir a un lugar privado?

translation.en: This is lovely.
-So Edward. -I know.
translation.es: -Muy al estilo de Edward. -Ya lo sé.

translation.en: You're writing a novel?
Yeah, that's mine.
-Sorry. -Just like your brother.
Actually, I was writing before my brother.
translation.es: Yo empecé a escribir antes que mi hermano.

translation.en: I got a couple of pieces published in Jet. One about hypertension.
translation.es: Me publicaron un par de artículos en Jet. Uno sobre la hipertensión.

translation.en: That was a while back, though,
and now I'm working mainly as a tax accountant.
Well, then, you must be very proud of Ryan. Getting all of his novels published.
translation.es: Debes de estar orgulloso de Ryan. Le publican todas sus novelas.

translation.en: Yeah. Pretty proud.
What did you wanna talk about?
Your father and I were very close.
translation.es: Tu papá y yo éramos íntimos.

translation.en: -That's nice, that's nice. -Spent a lot of time together.
translation.es: -Qué bien, qué bien. -Pasamos mucho tiempo juntos.

translation.en: Okay, well, you know, Dad was a fun guy.
I have some photos I want to show you. Few snaps of us.
translation.es: Quiero enseñarte unas fotos. De nosotros dos.

translation.en: That's me and your dad at Venice Beach, Muscle Beach.
translation.es: Ahí estamos en Venice Beach, con los levanta pesas.

translation.en: And here we are in West Hollywood, at the Halloween parade.
translation.es: Y aquí estamos en el desfile de Noche de Brujas.

translation.en: I don't know if you've ever been, but what a spectacle that is.
translation.es: No sé si alguna vez has ido. Es todo un espectáculo.

translation.en: Oscar.
How'd you get in here?
And here we are at the premiere of Dreamgirls.
translation.es: Y aquí estamos en el estreno de “Soñadoras”.

translation.en: I was dressed as Deena and your father just had to be Effie.
translation.es: Yo me vestí de Deena y tu papá tenía que ser Effie.

translation.en: So, how exactly did you know my father?
translation.es: ¿De dónde conocías precisamente a mi papá?

translation.en: You think you can come in here and just slander my dad's name
translation.es: ¿Crees que puedes venir y manchar el nombre de mi papá...

translation.en: by showing me a couple of pictures of you guys going to see Dreamgirls?
So what? I've seen Dreamgirls two, three times.
Doesn't mean I'm gay.
-What's that prove? -I'm sorry.
I guess he would've told you himself, but he wasn't sure how you'd react.
translation.es: Él te lo hubiera dicho. No sabía cómo ibas a reaccionar.

translation.en: Does my mother know?
No. And there's no reason she has to.
translation.es: No. Y no tiene por qué saberlo.

translation.en: Just as long as I get what's owed to me.
translation.es: Mientras me den lo que me deben.

translation.en: Excuse me? What's owed to you?
Well, I deserve something.
Your father and I were lovers and he left me absolutely nothing in his will.
translation.es: Éramos amantes. No me dejó nada en su testamento.

translation.en: How do you think that makes me feel?
I don't know and I don't care.
translation.es: No sé y no me importa.

translation.en: I will tell you how it makes me feel. Cheap.
translation.es: Te diré cómo me siento. Como basura.

translation.en: -Like some cheap piece of ass. -What do you want?
What I want is a lot, but I'm not asking you for what I want.
translation.es: Quiero mucho, pero no te estoy pidiendo lo que quiero.

translation.en: Are you smoking meth? I'm not giving you $30,000.
translation.es: ¿Estás fumando meth? ¡Yo no te voy a dar $30.000!

translation.en: I'm trying to buy a house! I'm trying to have a kid!
I can't give you $30,000!
Now, listen, your father made me a promise to take care of me.
translation.es: Tu papá me prometió que me iba a cuidar.

translation.en: I made certain sacrifices to keep him happy.
translation.es: Hice ciertos sacrificios para mantenerlo contento.

translation.en: Now, I don't want to, but I will show these photos to your mother.
translation.es: No quiero, pero le voy a enseñar las fotos a tu mamá.

translation.en: Do you really want me to do that?
Shit!
Wait here.
Oh, Aaron. I was just telling George here how
translation.es: Ay, Aarón. Le estaba diciendo a George...

translation.en: when we were boys together,
your father used to make us all go skinny-dipping.
-Isn't that funny? -Hilarious.
-Well, maybe your husband will know. -Wait! Wait! Aaron! Aaron!
Sometime today?
Anything I can do to help?
No, I'm fine, thank you.
Oscar, please.
Say, Elaine, what are you doing after the funeral?
translation.es: ¿Qué vas a hacer después del funeral?

translation.en: I got Usher tickets, front row, Staples Center.
translation.es: Tengo boletos para ver a Usher.

translation.en: You don't have Usher tickets.
Well, no, not yet, but I can get them like that.
translation.es: Todavía no, pero los puedo tener.

translation.en: You know what? Derek, please, go away.
You don't deserve her!
He doesn't.
I'm gonna go find Norman.
So, you've never been to New York?
I've been, with my parents once.
Now, that's not seeing New York. You got to come visit. Just hang out.
translation.es: Eso no es ver Nueva York. Ven de visita a divertirte.

translation.en: -When's your birthday? -I turned 18 last week.
Yeah. Well, that's my favorite number, girl.
translation.es: Sí. Ese es mi número favorito.

translation.en: You know, I want you to get yourself on a bus
translation.es: Quiero que te subas en un autobús...

translation.en: and come visit me in New York this year. Can you do that?
translation.es: ...y me vengas a visitar. ¿Puedes hacer eso?

translation.en: For me?
All right. Yeah.
Yeah, that's what I'm talking about. And I got all kind of snacks for you.
translation.es: Sí, así me gusta. Y tengo toda clase de cosas ricas.

translation.en: -Really? -You like Sugar Daddies?
-Ryan, Ryan, I need to talk to you. -Gummi bears...
-Ryan, I need to talk... -Aaron, not now.
-I really need to talk to you. -Aaron, give me five minutes, okay?
Bro, I'm grieving here.
Martina, could you excuse us? We've really got to talk about something.
translation.es: ¿Nos disculpas? Tenemos que hablar de algo.

translation.en: Hey, SpongeBob is on. All right, talk to you later.
translation.es: Están pasando Bob Esponja. Bueno, hablamos luego.

translation.en: What are you doing?
Remember the guy that came by a little earlier, that we didn't recognize?
translation.es: ¿Te acuerdas del tipo que vino antes, que no reconocimos?

translation.en: -Dude in the leather jacket. -Yeah, well,
he came by the study, and he showed me some pictures of him and Dad.
translation.es: Pasó al estudio y me enseñó unas fotos de él con papá.

translation.en: So? So, he showed you some pictures,
-what's wrong with that? -Pictures of him and Dad together.
translation.es: -¿Qué tiene de malo? -Fotos de papá y él...juntos.

translation.en: -So, we playing 20 questions now or what? -He was Dad's lover.
translation.es: -¿Estamos jugando a las 20 preguntas? -Era amante de papá.

translation.en: -No, man. No, no, no, no. -Yeah, yeah, the guy's name is Frank.
He showed me some pictures of him and Dad doing stuff.
translation.es: Me enseñó fotos de él y papá haciendo cosas.

translation.en: You telling me our father was on the downlow?
-Way down low. -Hell no.
I don't believe that. My father's not gay.
translation.es: No te creo. Mi papá no era gay.

translation.en: Matter of fact, he's so straight, he makes me seem gay.
translation.es: Era tan macho que hace que yo parezca gay.

translation.en: And I ain't fucking gay.
Daddy!
I ain't know he did yoga.
Look. He got the wheelbarrow.
-Thanks. -I just don't get it.
I don't know what she sees in that poser that she doesn't see in me.
translation.es: ¿Qué le ve a ese impostor que no tenga yo?

translation.en: -Seems serious, don't it? -Of course it is, it's my life.
I've only been sleeping like eight hours a night, man.
-I'm at my wit's end. -What?
-No, dude. -Yeah?
-Me. Pigment mutation? -Right.
Well, maybe it's vitiligo, that thing Michael Jackson had on his balls.
translation.es: ¿Será “vitiglio”?, lo que Michael Jackson tenía en sus pelotas.

translation.en: I don't know what Michael Jackson had on his balls.
translation.es: No sé qué tenía Michael Jackson en sus pelotas.

translation.en: -Okay. -You asking me,
translation.es: Me preguntas como si las hubiera visto.

translation.en: -Hey. Try this cake. It might have nuts in it. -So?
Elaine's dad said I might just be allergic to nuts.
translation.es: El papá de Elaine dijo que puede ser alergia.

translation.en: So, don't eat nuts. Put the fork down. Don't eat it.
translation.es: No comas nueces. Baja el tenedor.

translation.en: That's what I do when I'm stressed. I eat.
You ain't gonna eat when your hand falls off, papa.
translation.es: No vas a comer cuando se te caiga la mano.

translation.en: Just try the cake for me. See if it has nuts in it, please?
translation.es: Prueba el pastel, dime si tiene nueces.

translation.en: Elaine's driving me crazy, and you're not helping.
translation.es: Elaine me está volviendo loco. No me estás ayudando.

translation.en: Hey, fathead. Quit slopping down food for a second. Make me a plate.
translation.es: Oye, gordo. Deja de atragantarte y prepárame un plato.

translation.en: I'm gonna wash my hands, and make you a dynamite plate.
translation.es: Me voy a lavar las manos y a prepararle un buen plato.

translation.en: I know you like hot sauce on your collard greens. That's...
translation.es: Le gustan las berzas con salsa picante.

translation.en: Come here to papa.
Uncle Russell.
Have you seen a little pill, pill bottle with some Valium in it?
-Is that a yes or... -God, don't scare me like that.
Shit tastes like it got nuts in it. Shit.
translation.es: Sabe a que tiene nueces. Mierda.

translation.en: -I'm sure we'll start again soon. -Dr. Barnes! Dr. Barnes!
-Let's go back inside. -Soon. I just need a moment alone.
-Dr. Barnes, just one quick... -Excuse me.
How you doing, Miss Cynthia?
-You look good. -Thank you.
You hanging in there? Your macaroni is superb.
translation.es: ¿Se siente bien? Sus macarrones están deliciosos.

translation.en: Six different cheeses. He looked good in that box.
translation.es: Seis quesos diferentes. Se veía bien.

translation.en: The rigor mortis set in well. You know, except for that left hand.
translation.es: El rigor mortis no lo afectó. Excepto por la mano izquierda.

translation.en: You might just wanna throw an oven mitt or something on there. Yeah.
translation.es: Póngale un guante de cocina o algo.

translation.en: The suit he got on is magnificent, you know.
Looked like Colin Powell. Looked just like a Republican.
translation.es: Parecía Colin Powell. Parecía un republicano.

translation.en: But did you check the shoes?
'Cause sometimes they take the shoes right off their feet in the funeral home, right?
translation.es: A veces les quitan los zapatos en las funerarias.

translation.en: -Especially if they're gators. -Norman. Just...
-Excuse me. -Sorry, Miss Cynthia.
Jesus Christ!
Somebody dropped they pills.
translation.es: Se le cayeron a alguien sus pastillas.

translation.en: If we don't get him the money right now, he's gonna start showing Mom the pictures.
translation.es: Si no le damos el dinero, le enseñará las fotos a mamá.

translation.en: -Let me think. All right? Let me think. -Think, think.
-You gonna have to pay him, then. -That's your big idea?
translation.es: -Le vas a tener que pagar. -¿Esa es tu gran idea?

translation.en: I'm gonna have to pay him? Where's your money?
Don't you have a savings or a nest egg? A damn piggy bank?
Aaron, I'm in debt up to my ass. I'm broke, man. It's "Hammertime," okay?
translation.es: Estoy en deudas hasta el cuello. Estoy quebrado. Me va a pasar lo que a Hammer.

translation.en: If I don't get some money soon, I'm gonna have to do a damn reality show.
translation.es: Si no consigo dinero, tendré que hacer un reality show.

translation.en: Okay, so, I gotta pay for the funeral, the catering, and all this other shit,
translation.es: Tengo que pagar el funeral, la comida y todo lo demás...

translation.en: and now I gotta pull $30,000 out of my ass?
translation.es: ...¿y ahora tengo que sacar $30.000 del aire?

translation.en: -You know, he's your dad, too. -Yeah, but you the oldest.
translation.es: -También es tu papá. -Pero tú eres el mayor.

translation.en: -By nine months, as you love to point out. -Doesn't matter.
translation.es: -Por 9 meses, como te encanta decir. -No importa.

translation.en: Besides, you been living off of Mom and Dad long enough.
translation.es: Mamá y papá ya te han mantenido bastante.

translation.en: You must've saved some money. What? You haven't paid rent in a long time.
translation.es: Debes de tener ahorros. Hace mucho que no pagas renta.

translation.en: Hey, hey, I've been living with them, not off them.
translation.es: He vivido con ellos, no de ellos.

translation.en: And Dad's been retired for five years.
Who do you think's been paying all these bills?
Well, if we both got money issues, what can we do? Fuck him! Fuck...
translation.es: Si los dos tenemos problemas de dinero, al carajo con él.

translation.en: Fuck him, Aaron. Fuck him.
Pay the man. Just pay him.
translation.es: Págale al tipo. Nada más págale.

translation.en: -Are you okay there, friend? -Hey, fuck no.
My nephew's dead, and the little bastards ate all the potato salad. Shit.
translation.es: Mi sobrino se murió y no queda ensalada.

translation.en: Listen, I think we're just about ready to start that service again.
translation.es: Ya estamos listos para reanudar el servicio.

translation.en: Just five more minutes, please, please. Just five. Five.
Hey, hey, baby, what's going on? Is everything okay?
No, we're not gonna be able to move out as soon as we hoped. I'm sorry. I'm sorry.
translation.es: No nos vamos a poder mudar pronto. Perdóname.

translation.en: Wait. Listen to me. Hello? What are you talking about?
You know I wouldn't have said it unless I had a good reason.
translation.es: No lo hubiera dicho sin tener una buena razón.

translation.en: -Okay, fine, so what's the reason? -Aaron, we don't have time right now.
translation.es: -¿Y cuál es la razón? -No tenemos tiempo ahora. Vámonos.

translation.en: Aaron, listen, I am trying to be understanding,
but you have some explaining to do. And I mean it!
Just a little more time, okay?
translation.es: Dame sólo un poco de tiempo.

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey, hey, that's not supposed to be read yet.
translation.es: Eso todavía no se puede leer.

translation.en: -Well, it was on the coffee table. -And what's that supposed to mean?
translation.es: -Estaba en la mesa. -¿Y eso qué tiene?

translation.en: Well, when someone leaves something on a coffee table,
translation.es: Cuando alguien deja algo en una mesa...

translation.en: it's assumed it's for everybody. That's pretty standard.
translation.es: ...se supone que es para todos. Es lo aceptado.

translation.en: Those are coffee table rules.
translation.es: Son las reglas de las mesas.

translation.en: -Can we get to the point here? -Fine by me.
So, I write the check, you give us the photos,
translation.es: Yo escribo el cheque, tú nos das las fotos...

translation.en: and you stay away from our mother.
translation.es: ...y no te acercas a mi mamá.

translation.en: -Is that the deal? -Deal.
-What's your last name? -Lovett.
With two "Ts."
-Lovett. -Is that your first one?
-What? -The novel. It's a first draft.
-Yeah. Yeah, yeah, so? -No, nothing.
I tried writing once. Didn't work for me, either.
translation.es: Yo traté de escribir una vez. Tampoco me salió a mí.

translation.en: I think it's like a gift. Either you have it or you don't.
translation.es: Creo que es un don. O lo tienes o no.

translation.en: Must be hard for you, though.
I mean, your brother being a bestselling author and all.
Your father and I read Rhonda's Tiny Box cover to cover together.
translation.es: Tu papá y yo leímos La cajita de Rhonda, de principio a fin.

translation.en: We loved it. He was so proud of you.
translation.es: Nos encantó. Él estaba muy orgulloso de ti.

translation.en: Well, thank you. I guess.
-That's it. I can't do it. -Whoa, whoa, whoa, Aaron. Aaron, no, no.
translation.es: -Se acabó. No lo puedo hacer. -Alto. Aarón, no.

translation.en: What are you doing?
There is no way in the world I'm giving this guy my hard-earned money. No.
translation.es: Por ningún motivo le voy a dar el dinero que he ganado.

translation.en: Hey, don't be stupid, okay?
Now, I'll pay you back as soon as my advance comes in.
translation.es: Te pago cuando me llegue mi adelanto.

translation.en: He picks today, the day of our father's funeral.
translation.es: Escogió hoy, el día del funeral de nuestro padre.

translation.en: And then on top of that, he insults my book? No! No!
-But he got pictures. -So what? I don't give a fuck what he's got.
translation.es: Pero tiene fotos. ¿Y qué? Me importa un carajo lo que tenga.

translation.en: He can show them to the world. He can put them on Facebook for all I care.
translation.es: Que se las enseñe al mundo. Que las ponga en Facebook.

translation.en: Who the fuck does he think he is?
Fine. But this is on your head.
translation.es: Está bien. Pero va a pesar sobre tu conciencia.

translation.en: Whoa, whoa. Hold on. Hold on now, hold on.
Okay, you need to back off.
-No, no, no. Let's discuss this for a minute. -There is nothing to discuss.
translation.es: -Vamos a discutir esto. -No hay nada que discutir.

translation.en: -No, don't... -I said back off, buddy!
You gonna bring a gat to a funeral?
Now, nobody got to get capped. Nobody...
translation.es: No hay que dispararle a nadie.

translation.en: -Get his gun! Get his gun! -He ain't got no damn gun.
-You got any rope? Any duct tape? -Hey, what do I look like, a serial killer?
I don't just keep rope and duct tape in my pocket.
translation.es: ¡No traigo una cuerda ni una cinta!

translation.en: -I can't see nothing. There you go. -Help! Help!
-Hey, use your tie! -My tie, my tie?
-What the fuck am I gonna do with my tie? -Stuff it in his mouth.
All right, first key... First key to war is to cut off communication.
translation.es: En la guerra lo primero es cortar comunicación.

translation.en: All right, now, grab that curtain thing. Hurry up. Grab the curtain thing.
translation.es: Ahora agarra esa cosa de las cortinas. ¡Apúrate!

translation.en: Tie his legs. Come on, Aaron, damn!
-Feel like I'm in a fucking rodeo! -Yeah, yeah. Okay, now get his hands. Shit.
translation.es: -¡Siento que estoy en un rodeo! -¡Ahora amárrale las manos!

translation.en: God damn. Strong, ain't he? Damn it, do I gotta do everything?
translation.es: ¡Maldita sea! Es fuerte, ¿no? ¿Yo tengo que hacer todo?

translation.en: Everything but write a fucking check!
You know what was in that cake? What's going on? Who's that dude?
translation.es: ¿Saben qué había en ese pastel? ¿Quién es él?

translation.en: Norman, come in and shut the damn door. Come on, Aaron, tie it.
translation.es: Entra y cierra la puerta. Aarón, amárralo.

translation.en: -What's happening? -He having a seizure.
You know what? I just found some Valium outside.
-You think this will calm him down? -Good. Yeah, yeah, give him some.
translation.es: -¿Creen que esto lo calme? -Sí, dale unos.

translation.en: -Okay. All right. -Come on.
Put this jacket under his head
translation.es: Ponle el saco bajo la cabeza...

translation.en: so he don't bite down on his tongue.
I learned that procedure at Boys and Girls High School.
-Come on. -Here, buddy, this'll make you feel calm.
translation.es: Toma, amiguito. Esto te va a calmar.

translation.en: -Open up, open up. -There you go.
-Right there. Yes, yes, baby. -Open up, open up.
-Yeah. -Look at that. You gonna be fine, my friend.
translation.es: Mira eso. Te vas a poner bien, amigo.

translation.en: -Did you guys happen to see a little... -Come, come in, Jeff, come in.
Norman, I told you to lock the damn door.
translation.es: Te dije que cerraras con llave.

translation.en: You said, "Shut the damn door," Ryan!
-What's... What's going on? -He's having a seizure.
-Yeah. So, why is he all tied up? -We don't want him to swallow his tongue.
translation.es: -¿Por qué lo tienen amarrado? -Para que no se trague la lengua.

translation.en: No. That's part of the medical procedure.
Oh, God.
He's blackmailing you? Over what?
If I could tell you, it wouldn't be blackmail, now, would it?
translation.es: Si te pudiera decir, no sería chantaje, ¿verdad?

translation.en: Hey, look, just trust us. He's the bad guy. Okay? We'll explain it to you later.
translation.es: Créenos, él es el malo. Luego te explicamos.

translation.en: Yeah, well, what are we gonna do with him?
Yeah, what are we gonna do, Ryan? Now that you've jumped his ass?
translation.es: ¿Qué vamos a hacer? ¿Ya que lo atacaste?

translation.en: -I don't know. Okay? You think, people. -You're the big writer.
Why don't you write something where we all live happily ever after?
-How long's that Valium gonna last? -Valium? What... What Valium?
translation.es: -¿Cuánto va a durar el Valium? -¿El Valium? ¿Cuál Valium?

translation.en: I found a bottle of Valium,
so we gave him a few, thinking it would calm him down.
You gave him a few of these? Oh, shit.
-What? -What?
I just gave him a few Valium.
I found them on the ground outside.
All right, see, here's the story.
All right. Everybody calling these little guys here Valium,
translation.es: Todos llaman a esas pastillas Valium...

translation.en: -they're wrong, 'cause it's not Valium. -Yeah, and?
It's more like acid mixed with acid, which is acid.
translation.es: Es más bien ácido mezclado con ácido, lo cual es ácido.

translation.en: And Oscar took one earlier by mistake, which is why he's been acting all crazy.
translation.es: Óscar tomó una antes por error. Por eso está como loquito.

translation.en: Jeff, what are you doing with that stuff?
I just whipped up a simple batch for a friend.
translation.es: Le hice unas pastillas a un amigo.

translation.en: -What friend, Amy Winehouse? -Wait. Wait a minute.
You telling us that Elaine's boyfriend,
old boy who knocked over our father's coffin,
translation.es: ...el chico que tumbó el ataúd de papá...

translation.en: -only had one of those things? -Yeah. One.
-Oh, shit. -Shit's right.
-And you gave him how many? -About four or five.
Four or five? Jesus, Norman! That poor bastard.
translation.es: ¿Cuatro o cinco? ¡Dios mío, Norman! Ese pobre desgraciado.

translation.en: -I thought they were Valium. -Look, you at a ten, I need you at a two.
translation.es: -¡Creía que era Valium! -Estás en 10, habla en 2.

translation.en: Jeff, I thought they were Valium.
-But five? -Yes.
I mean, I wouldn't give somebody five cough drops.
translation.es: Yo no doy 5 pastillas ni para la tos.

translation.en: See, that's 'cause the wave cap is too tight.
translation.es: Es que traes la gorra demasiado apretada.

translation.en: Okay, okay, maybe we should call an ambulance.
If anyone finds out that this guy's been force-fed acid,
translation.es: Si se enteran que le dimos ácido...

translation.en: we could all be arrested. TMZ, here I come.
-Could he die? -Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey!
-What? -Could he die?
No! Crazy. Maybe.
A little bit. Possibly. It depends.
Aaron? Ryan, honey? Are you in there, baby?
We need to get things started.
Ma, we'll be right out.
Okay, look, look, look. We gotta go out there, okay?
We gotta buy some time until we figure this out.
You two stay here and watch him.
translation.es: Uds. dos quédense aquí y vigílenlo.

translation.en: What you mean, us stay here and watch...
Norman, just make sure he doesn't escape, okay?
translation.es: Asegúrate de que no se escape.

translation.en: Just lock the door behind us.
This is all your fault. You and your chemistry set, man.
translation.es: Es culpa tuya. Tú y tu juego de química...

translation.en: -Ever since the ninth grade... -Shut up, Norman.

Really?
Baby, you scared me. Don't do that.

-Great. -It's okay.
I wish somebody would give me a baby.

This is... It's upsetting for me, too.
I'm gonna go check on Cynthia.

Oh, my God!

Honey. Oh, shit.

Someone's coming up. You're gonna be fine.

Pull yourself back up!

Norman.

Aaron?

Thank you, Jeff.

Thank you.
I need to go get, like, a big-ass Tic Tac right now.
Oh, God. Oh, baby.
-Oh, shit. -Jeff...

-Elaine. -Dad.

Stay away from my daughter.

No! I'm not gonna stay out of it. This is my life.

Yeah.
I love you, too, Dad.

translation.en: Okay, I got your pants. I got your pants. Hold on.
Never mind that. What about that dead body you dragged in here?
translation.es: Olviden eso. ¿Qué pasó con el cadáver que trajeron?

translation.en: -What... -Dead body?
I know a dead man when I see one. I live in a goddamn retirement home.
translation.es: ¡Yo he visto muertos! ¡Vivo en un asilo de ancianos!

translation.en: Let's go, God damn it. It smells in this room. Shit!
-How's the... How's the skin thing? -I don't know.
I'm more concerned with the shit smell. Can you tell?

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, but the thing on your hand, you just put a little vinegar on it.
translation.es: Sí, pero para la mano, ponte un poco de vinagre.

translation.en: That'll clear it right up. It's an old family secret.

translation.en: The shit thing, I can't help you with.
translation.es: Con la mierda no te puedo ayudar.

translation.en: I would recommend a shower or a bath.
-Thanks. -You're welcome.
-I'm sorry about the whole Elaine thing. -It's okay.
Did you hear she's gonna have a kid? Can you see me as a dad?

translation.en: Well, this shit's been crazy.
You have people falling out of the casket, you got people hanging off the roof.

translation.en: Can I have the keys? I'm gonna go wait in the car.

translation.en: -What? -I'm just tired.
-Love you. -Hey, I love you, too.
I saw him! He was dead!

translation.en: No, dumbshit. In the bathroom. He was in the bathroom dead.

translation.en: -Listen, about that stuff earlier, I... -I know, we'll work it out.

translation.en: -Agreed? -Agreed.
Let's just get through this day
and then we'll worry about the rest of our lives.
translation.es: Luego nos preocupamos por lo demás.

translation.en: I still have to give this eulogy.
After everything I found out.
We've really got to get this damn thing started.
Look, we're gonna have to zip through this thing now, son.
I mean, I've already missed a funeral and two christenings.

translation.en: -No! -No.
All right.
Everybody in their seats now.
-You with the hat? -Yeah?
Sit on down.
Now, I'd like to apologize on behalf of the family

translation.en: for all of the distractions.
Aaron, the oldest son, would like to say a few words about his father.

translation.en: Thank you.
"My father was an exceptional man.

translation.en: "He was born in 19..."
-What the hell is going on now? -There's someone in there.
I knew it! I knew it!
"He was born in 1930..."
Shit.
What the fuck!
What the fuck you doing in my father's coffin?

translation.en: Edward, I miss you!
Leave me with my Edward!
My picture. My beautiful memories!
No, Mama, don't. Give me...
You bastard!
My father!
My father was an exceptional man.

translation.en: Did he have his faults?
Yeah.
But he worked hard for his family.
translation.es: Pero trabajó duro para mantener a su familia.

translation.en: All I wanted to do today
translation.es: Lo único que yo quería hacer hoy...

translation.es: ...era decirle cuánto lo queríamos, lo apreciábamos y lo respetábamos.

translation.en: Is that really too much to ask for?
So, maybe he loved Dreamgirls more than most men.
translation.es: Quizá le gustaba “Las Soñadoras” más que a otros hombres.

translation.en: But, hey, life is complicated.
We do our best.
And Dad, he did his best.
translation.es: Y mi papá hizo lo mejor posible.

translation.en: was teach us to chase after our dreams.
translation.es: Nos enseñó a tratar de realizar nuestros sueños.

translation.en: So, when you leave here today,
translation.es: Cuando se vayan hoy de aquí...

translation.en: I want you to remember my father for who he truly was,
translation.es: ...recuerden a mi padre como realmente era:

translation.en: a loving, kind, gentle man, that never judged anyone,
translation.es: Cariñoso, bueno, un hombre gentil que nunca juzgaba a nadie...

translation.en: who never cast disparaging remarks
or held prejudice against any race, creed, gender,
translation.es: ...ni tenía prejuicios contra ninguna raza, credo, género...

translation.en: or height.
And if I turn out to be just half the man that my father was,
translation.es: Si logro ser la mitad de hombre que fue mi padre...

translation.en: then the child I'm planning on having with my beautiful wife
translation.es: ...entonces el niño que planeo tener con mi hermosa esposa...

translation.en: will be truly blessed.
Thank you.
Well done, son.
It's gonna be good, boy.
Oscar, let's not do this again.

-Sis. -Baby, listen,
